headline: 3 Leaders Of Church Are Accused Of Trafficking
abstract: Administrators for the Kingdom of Jesus Christ arranged dozens of false marriages so workers at a fraudulent charity could stay in the United States, prosecutors said.
lead_paragraph: Three leaders of a megachurch based in the Philippines were arrested on Wednesday in California and Virginia on charges that they ran a human trafficking ring, one that the Justice Department said had arranged for dozens of sham marriages in the United States to support a fraudulent charity.
